mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lost_item (item_name, category, description, found_date, found_location, image_url) VALUES (#{itemName}, #{category}, #{description}, #{foundDate}, #{foundLocation}, #{imageUrl})
mapper.select:
SELECT id, item_name as itemName, found_date as foundDate, category, image_url as imageUrl, description FROM lost_item
AND category = #{category}
AND found_date >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND found_date <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND item_name LIKE '%' || #{itemName} || '%'
ORDER BY found_date DESC
